title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 376: Featuring Jason Robertson + Dustin Johnson
description:
On Episode 376 of Spittinâ€™ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Jason Robertson and Dustin Johnson. Jason joined (01:43:50) to discuss his young NHL career, his upbringing, playing in Dallas and tons more. But first, the guys discuss their weekends and dive into some NHL news, including the Leafs Goaltending issues, Wayne Simmonds, the Blue Jackets and tons more. Biz also talks about his recent hatred for Nathan MacKinnon. The guys are then joined by Dustin Johnson (2:56:40) for a quick interview about his career. The guys wrap up the show talking Phil/Tiger and some things to watch on TV.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
